head.title: Finance/New Issues; World Bank's Global Issue

identified-content.org: INTERNATIONAL BANK FOR RECONSTRUCTION AND DEVELOPMENT (IBRD)
identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Banking, Finance and Insurance

hedline.hl1: Finance/New Issues; World Bank's Global Issue

block.p: LEAD: The World Bank said today that it planned to soon offer its third dollar-denominated global bond issue. The issue's size would be $1.5 billion to $2 billion, the bank said.
LEAD: The World Bank said today that it planned to soon offer its third dollar-denominated global bond issue. The issue's size would be $1.5 billion to $2 billion, the bank said.
Deutsche Bank and Salomon The issue's size would be $1.5 billion to $2 billion, the bank said.
Brothers will serve as lead managers of the group of investment dealers that will bring the issue to market.

Credit Suisse-First Boston Ltd., J. P. Morgan Securities Inc., Lehman Brothers, Merrill Lynch Capital Markets, Morgan Stanley & Company, Nikko Securities (Europe) Ltd., Nomura Securities, Paribas Capital Markets Group, S. G. Warburg Securities and UBS Phillips and Drew Securities Ltd.
